item.description:
Not such a good turn out for March's meetup - we're thinking everyone was busy with Easter weekend plans! Hope everyone had a great Easter & are getting ready for the spring (yeah!). Our April meetup will be held outside (providing good weather), which I know the pups will love.

We are also hosting the National Pet Adoptathon on Saturday, May 3. We have several local rescue groups coming with many asoptable cats & dogs. The adoptathon will be held from 11am-3pm at the Best Friends location. Please let all of your friends know too!

Let me know if you have any questions!

Held at Best Friends Pet Care off of Rt-97 less than a mile from I-95.

Thanks, Mirya

group.name: The Greater Boston Active Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston Active Dogs April Meeting
